title: Faint Signal
loreText: Your device picks up a rhythmic static. It matches the old signatures of Digit1, the Architect. Could this be a remnant of his original code?

title: Corrupted Soil
loreText: The ground here is discolored, pulsing with a faint violet hue. It's a manifestation of Drystan's virus. Better scan it before it spreads.

title: Overgrown Stash
loreText: Vines have wrapped tightly around a small lockbox. It bears the mark of Cera's Green Faction. Likely supplies for those fighting to maintain the shattered world.

title: Smuggler's Drop
loreText: A nondescript package tucked behind some debris. The Yellow Faction operates here. Merivia's thieves guild doesn't leave things by accident.

title: Lost Archive
loreText: A data drive half-buried in the dust. It looks like Blue Faction property. Nero would kill to get this back into the library.

title: Spent Shell casing
loreText: Heavy caliber casings litter the area. Agni's Red Faction was here recently. The metal is still warm.

title: Rift Echo
loreText: The air shimmers here. A micro-rift caused by past experiments. It feels like the Shard itself is trying to pull apart.

title: Ancient Coin
loreText: You spot a glint in the rubble. It looks like an ancient coin dropped by a merchant centuries ago, before the Shard broke.
